channel.title: New Line on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Hollywood Flashback: Before the Podcast Era, ‘Pump Up the Volume’ Made Noise
item.description: Playing a pirate radio DJ, Christian Slater portended today’s podcasters in this hit teen angst feature that debuted 35 years ago.

item.title: Hollywood Flashback: Before the Podcast Era, ‘Pump Up the Volume’ Made Noise
item.description: Playing a pirate radio DJ, Christian Slater portended today’s podcasters in this hit teen angst feature that debuted 35 years ago.

item.title: Josh Brolin and Julia Garner Clash in ‘Weapons’ But Their Bond Off-Screen Was “Cellular, Sibling Sh**”
item.description: The Marvel Cinematic Universe alums traded compliments at the ‘Weapons’ premiere in L.A. “We just hit it off immediately,” Brolin said with a smile. “We hung out a lot, which never happens.”

item.title: Josh Brolin and Julia Garner Clash in ‘Weapons’ But Their Bond Off-Screen Was “Cellular, Sibling Sh**”
item.description: The Marvel Cinematic Universe alums traded compliments at the ‘Weapons’ premiere in L.A. “We just hit it off immediately,” Brolin said with a smile. “We hung out a lot, which never happens.”

item.title: Johnny Cage Unleashes His Power of Being “Incredibly Handsome” in ‘Mortal Kombat II’ Trailer
item.description: Based on the popular video game, director Simon McQuoid’s follow-up to his 2021 feature hits theaters this fall.
